Legislative History of Laws

For Law 18-66, see notes following ยง 50-2651.

Delegation of Authority

Delegation of Rulemaking Authority under the Commercial Curbside Loading Zone Implementation Act of 2009, see Mayor's Order 2010-63, April 23, 2010 (57 DCR 3511).

DC CODE ยง 50-2652

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: Within 120 days of October 22, 2009, the Mayor, pursuant to subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2, shall issue rules to implement the provisions of this subchapter.

The proposed rules shall be submitted to the Council for a 30-day period of review, excluding Saturdays, Sundays, legal holidays, and days of Council recess. If the Council does not approve or disapprove the proposed rules, in whole or in part, by resolution within this 30-day review period, the proposed rules shall be deemed approved.

title.text: Motor and Non-Motor Vehicles and Traffic. (Refs & Annos)

subtitle.text: Vehicles on Public and Private Space.
